about_the_game:
Universe of Trials is a fast-paced multiplayer climbing game that tests your skill across a variety of exciting game modes. Race against friends in increasingly challenging environments, each filled with unique obstacles and no checkpoints. Every mode offers a fresh challenge—whether it's the classic climb, surviving in "Floor is Lava," avoiding disappearing platforms in "Falling Floor," or outlasting everyone in "Last to Leave." Every fall demands quick reflexes and sharp strategy as you push for victory.

Key Features:

  • Multiplayer Competition: Challenge friends or players worldwide in various high-stakes modes.

  • Multiple Game Modes: From classic races to "Floor is Lava," "Falling Floor," and "Last to Leave," each mode keeps the gameplay fresh.

  • Dynamic Environments: Climb through diverse levels with unique themes and hazards.

  • Skill-Based Gameplay: Master precise movements and strategies to overcome obstacles and opponents.

  • No Checkpoints: Every fall tests your resolve in this high-intensity climb.

  • Simple Controls: Easy to pick up, challenging to master, perfect for casual and competitive play.

  • Leaderboards: Track your progress and compete for the top spot across multiple modes.

Are you ready to conquer the "Universe of Trials"? Rise above the competition and claim your victory!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A high-speed internet connection for better experience while playing online
